title: Ep 115: Dubs be smashing
itunes:author: Desus Nice & THE KID MERO
itunes:summary:
The brand is strong! The Bronx's very own Desus Nice & THE KID MERO aka the Bodega Boys (from Desus & Mero on Viceland) are giving you their irreverent yet hilarious takes on all things pop culture. Live from Red Bull Studios

This week: World cup, Life, Ugly ppl smashing and more!
